Import Your Goodreads Library

Import your Goodreads export to discover connections between your reading history and our creator database.

How to Export from Goodreads

  1. 1Go to Goodreads and sign in to your account
  2. 2Navigate to My Books → Import and Export
  3. 3Click "Export Library" to download your CSV file
  4. 4Upload the file below — we'll match books to our creator database

Drop your Goodreads CSV here

or

Supports Goodreads export CSV files
